Text:
@ exmnova

Stop putting links/advertising sites on your tittle description.It's not only just one ,but like 20-30 different.This ends here.

What wrong with putting the site it came from in the title?  I find it very helpful. 

Why not spend your time deleting duplicate torrents!!
And thanks exmnova.  You are doing a good job. Keep it up.

Why don't you get a life troll and stop sticking your nose to stuff that doesn't concern you.
Telling me what do to or not is kind of asking for it, don't you think?
What we do and not and why we choose to block certain domains ain't something we need to explain/justify to you or anyone else.This is for the best interest of TPB and it's users.

I won't ban your account for a simple reason.We're better than other sites and believe at freedom of speech.However there're limits as well when it comes to comments against staff/TPB crew.

Thank you for understanding and i honestly hope you get the hint./

WTC-SWE

haydn70ac , it was a mistake made by me
don't get angry at WTC :) for nothing

and besides it's all cleared up
